name: max-repel
effect: Used outside of battle : Trainer will skip encounters with wild Pokémon of a lower level than the lead party Pokémon. This effect wears off after the trainer takes 250 steps.
short_effect: For 250 steps, prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party’s lead Pokémon.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Repels weak wild POKéMON for 250 steps.
flavor_text.emerald: Repels weak wild POKéMON for 250 steps.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Prevents weak wild POKéMON from appearing for 250 steps.
